dict.string: Check who is streaming on Twitch.tv and watch your favorite stream via Livestreamer on VLC or mpv.

PATH="/usr/local/bin:$PATH"
if [ `which iina` ]; then streamlink -p iina {query} best & elif [ `which vlc` ]; then streamlink -p vlc {query} best & elif [ `which mpv` ]; then streamlink -p mpv {query} best & fi
List TOP live streams on twitch.tv.
Search live streams on twitch.tv (game or channel).
List TOP streamed games on twitch.tv.
Downloading game covers... Please don't close and wait, it takes ~1 min.
Preload top-game icons will speed up your regular usage.

keywords and description: ———————————————————————————————— twtop = top live streams on twitch.tv twgames = top streamed games on twitch.tv tw = search for a specific stream (game or streamer/channel)
optional: twcover = download game icons - preloading the covers speeds up your user experience
examples: ———————————————————————————————— ‚twtop’
‚tw warcraft‘ (searches for streams of „world of warcraft“ or „warcraft3“ as well as streams of a streamer who is called like „warcraftBoy“ or its stream title contains „warcraft“)
‚twgames‘
‚twcover‘
